articles.title: Melania Trump puts AI front and center at White House meeting
articles.summary: First lady Melania Trump hosted an artificial intelligence meeting with top industry leaders, including Google CEO Sundar Pichai Thursday.
articles.translated_title: Melania Trump puts AI front and center at White House meeting
articles.translated_summary: First lady Melania Trump hosted an artificial intelligence meeting with top industry leaders, including Google CEO Sundar Pichai Thursday.

articles.title: Investor Appetite for Pre-IPO AI Firms Is Pushing Valuations Sky-High
articles.summary: Investor appetite for companies linked to AI is high—and not just their stocks. Valuations for America’s hottest private artificial intelligence startups are soaring as investors clamor for exposure ahead of possible market debuts.
articles.translated_title: Investor Appetite for Pre-IPO AI Firms Is Pushing Valuations Sky-High
articles.translated_summary: Investor appetite for companies linked to AI is high—and not just their stocks. Valuations for America’s hottest private artificial intelligence startups are soaring as investors clamor for exposure ahead of possible market debuts.

articles.title: Tech giants pay talent millions of dollars
articles.summary: It costs billions of dollars to build artificial intelligence models, and tech companies are battling for talent to get ahead in the AI arms race.
articles.translated_title: Tech giants pay talent millions of dollars
articles.translated_summary: It costs billions of dollars to build artificial intelligence models, and tech companies are battling for talent to get ahead in the AI arms race.

articles.title: Cathie Wood Says Inflation Could Fall To 'Zero Or Even Negative' As AI Boom And Trump's Policies Could Push GDP Growth To 7%
articles.summary: Cathie Wood said artificial intelligence and other breakthrough technologies will spark a massive productivity boom that could push U.S. inflation to zero while reshaping economic growth.
articles.translated_title: Cathie Wood Says Inflation Could Fall To 'Zero Or Even Negative' As AI Boom And Trump's Policies Could Push GDP Growth To 7%
articles.translated_summary: Cathie Wood said artificial intelligence and other breakthrough technologies will spark a massive productivity boom that could push U.S. inflation to zero while reshaping economic growth.

articles.title: Artists Warn Fans to Avoid ‘Soulless, Meaningless' AI Knockoff Albums of Themselves
articles.summary: Artists are telling their fans not to listen to artificial intelligence (AI) knockoff albums of themselves that strangers are creating.
articles.translated_title: Artists Warn Fans to Avoid ‘Soulless, Meaningless' AI Knockoff Albums of Themselves
articles.translated_summary: Artists are telling their fans not to listen to artificial intelligence (AI) knockoff albums of themselves that strangers are creating.

articles.title: Stanford University’s AI Job Warning
articles.summary: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is reshaping career prospects. Discover how it affects job opportunities for young professionals.
articles.translated_summary: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is reshaping career prospects. Discover how it affects job opportunities for young professionals.

articles.title: Artificial Intelligence Communications Are Not Protected By Any Privilege
articles.summary: Discusses how a person's communications with Artificial Intelligence (AI) will not be protected by legal privileges such as attorney-client privilege.
articles.translated_title: Artificial Intelligence Communications Are Not Protected By Any Privilege
